title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 75 - Standards For Insurance That Qualifies For The Environmental Remediation Insurance Tax Credit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 75 - Standards For Insurance That Qualifies For The Environmental Remediation Insurance Tax Credit

State Regulations
§ 75.0 - Introduction
§ 75.1 - Required coverages
§ 75.2 - Disclosure of the portion of the premium paid for the coverage under section 3447(b) of the insurance law
§ 75.3 - Insurer certification form

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 75

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§201, 301, 2105, 2118, 3447

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
